summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the travel agency website. Verified that Bus, Car Rental, and Transfer tabs have been successfully removed from the hero search section, leaving only the 3 required tabs: Flight, Hotel, and Tour. All core functionality is working correctly.
passed_tests: Homepage loads successfully with proper hero section
Hero search tabs show only 3 options: Uçak bileti (Flight), Otel (Hotel), Tur (Tour)
Removed tabs (Bus/Otobüs, Car Rental/Araç kiralama, Transfer) are not present
All 3 hero tabs are clickable and switch active states properly
Header navigation works - logo links to homepage
Services page loads correctly at /services route
Language selector shows all 3 languages (TR, EN, AZ)
Language switching works - tested EN switch with proper content translation
Campaigns section is visible and functional
Footer section renders with proper company information
Newsletter signup form is present in footer
